title: Introducing OpenAI London
summary: OpenAI has announced the opening of its first international office in London. The move is part of OpenAI's commitment to expanding its operations and bringing in diverse perspectives. The London office will focus on research, engineering, and go-to-market functions related to artificial general intelligence (AGI). OpenAI sees the expansion as an opportunity to attract top talent and drive innovation in AGI development and policy. Interested individuals can find open positions in London on OpenAI's careers page.
